- Add lenses to your database by pressing "Lenses" in the option menu.
 - Add new rolls by pressing the + -icon.
 - Delete rolls by pressing the trash can icon.
 - You can view the frames of a roll by pressing on the roll you wish to view.
 - You can rename a roll by pressing and holding the roll you wish to rename.

- Add new frames by pressing the + -icon.
 - Delete frames by pressing the trash can icon.
 - You can edit a frame's information by pressing on it.
 - You can share the roll information by pressing the share icon. The app shares a text file formatted in semi-colon separated values. You can save this file in Dropbox, for example, and name the file with .csv ending.
